concept.title: 1519.705-70 Synopsis of contracts containing Pub. L. 95-507 subcontracting plans and goals.

conbody.p: The synopsis of contract award, where applicable, shall include a statement identifying the contract as one containing Public Law 95-507 subcontracting plans and goals.
